name: Sinop University Fisheries Faculty
goal: Turkey is a peninsula surrounded by seas on three sides and it also possesses many inner sources of water. The fields of research of Fisheries and Aquatic sciences Faculty are the fauna and flora living in the seas, rivers, and lakes of Turkey, their breeding, the sources of nourishment they provide, and the productivity of aquatic resources.  Fisheries Faculty of Sinop University has risen to national prominence as a centre for teaching research in Marine Biology and Ecology, Fishing Technology, Fish Processing, and Aquaculture.
interests: Education, Energy, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Marine Research, Marine Pollution, Biodiversity, Marine Protected Areas
